value.name: Manhunt Continues Well Over A Year Later For David Garcia-Espinal, School Custodian Accused Of Putting Cameras In School Bathrooms, As Victims Seek Justice In Court
value.description: School custodian David Garcia-Espinal has been on the run for well over a year – accused of secretly recording students and teachers in the bathrooms at a north suburban middle school.

video.name: School Custodian Accused Of Hiding Bathroom Cameras Has Been On The Run For Well Over A Year

value.name: Curbside, walk up jury qualification held in Webb County
value.description: Lopez along with Associate District Judge David Garcia teamed up again to conduct another curbside juror qualification This time there were well over 340 prospective jurors present and over 305 were qualified and empaneled for potential “in person” jury trials scheduled for June and July.

value.name: Malcolm Jenkins' Foundation Awards 12 High School Seniors with $2K in College Scholarships
value.description: Malcolm Jenkins and the Malcolm Jenkins Foundation with partner College Track New Orleans awarded twelve high school seniors $2,000 in scholarships for college.

video.name: Malcolm Jenkins Returns as a Leader

value.name: Police intercept 32 U.S.-bound illegals
value.description: SAN JOSE - Immigration officers and the police reported yesterday that they had intercepted 32 illegal immigrants from Ecuador who were on their way to the United States (U.S.). The operation took place in the northern part of the country,

value.name: Yet another Colombian social leader is murdered in Antioquia
value.description: Community leader Juan David García Naranjo, from the municipality of San Luis, Antioquia, in northern Colombia, and who had dedicated his life to social service, was murdered on Sunday afternoon, in an urban area of that municipality.

value.name: Google Photos testing new filters that let you search by type of content
value.description: For example: “Selfies of David Garcia” would present the same results as searching for “David Garcia” and then filtering out selfies.
